Name: Freya's Potion Shop
About the game: Freya finally opened the potion shop of her dream! But Freya’s mother used Freya’s debt as an excuse to offer her body to Freya’s creditor, Mr. Manji. To save Mr. Manji from Freya’s mother’s grasp, Freya was determined to pay Mr. Manji back as soon as possible. Help Freya collects ingredients by exploring the stages and collects cum by seducing and having sex with the enemies. Craft potions and sell them to make money so Freya can pay back her debt. Unique Platformer Defeat enemies by throwing potion bottles at the right strength. Simple game play and challenging stage design. Different ways to collect ingredients Seduce enemies, fuck with them, then collect their cum. Defeat enemies and collect what they drop. Explore the map and pick up anything you can find. Body Stats See how Freya’s body transform after all the cum collecting. Animated images! Exploration Explore the stages to find dropped potion recipes and hidden collection locations. Walk around towns and find people who needs help; they will give you nice rewards. Or you can walk around towns and seduce people…
